narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This 3rd prelicense inspection and exit briefing for a Class "C"  license was conducted with the applicant, Brian
Hood, ACI and Tyler Fields, VMO.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal 
Welfare Act.
Additional Inspectors
Hood Brian, Animal Care Inspector
